H

handleMessage(Message) - Method in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.PlaybackControlLayer.MessageHandler
Receives either a PlaybackControlLayer.FADE_OUT message (which hides the playback control layer) or a PlaybackControlLayer.SHOW_PROGRESS message (which updates the seek bar to reflect the progress in the video).
handler - Variable in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.PlaybackControlLayer
The message handler which deals with displaying progress and fading out the media controls We use it so that we can make the view fade out after a timeout (by sending a delayed message).
hide() - Method in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.PlaybackControlLayer
Fades the playback control layer out and then removes it from the LayerManager's container.
hide() - Method in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.SimpleVideoPlayer
Fades the playback control layer out and then removes it from the LayerManager's container.
hideContentPlayer() - Method in class com.google.googlemediaframeworkdemo.demo.adplayer.ImaPlayer
Pause and hide the content player.
hideTopChrome() - Method in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.PlaybackControlLayer
Hides the top chrome (which displays the logo, title, and action buttons).
hideTopChrome() - Method in class com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo.SimpleVideoPlayer
Hides the top chrome (which displays the logo, title, and action buttons).
